title: École pratique des hautes études commerciales
text:
L'école pratique des hautes études commerciales (EPHEC) is a university college in Belgium. The school has three campuses, <a href="Woluwe-Saint-Lambert">Woluwe-Saint-Lambert</a>, <a href="Louvain-la-Neuve">Louvain-la-Neuve</a> and <a href="Schaerbeek">Schaerbeek</a>, with the majority of courses taught in French and a few taught in English.
EPHEC offers the following degrees:
